divs: Sighting DetailsThis seems very similar case 26638 in Flagstaff, AZ the same time period and day. The object was North of the big dipper when I was looking at it at 8pm in eastern sky. It looked like it was blinking red and blue but looked different than any other star that was blinking. I first saw this at about 8pm in the eastern sky. I went outside to look again at 2am and it was still in the same spot in relation to the big dipper and was now almost straight over my house. I saw a lot of lights (maybe 1 every 5 seconds) headed very fast toward the object they looked like smaller stars with a golden hue. These were not meteors.
Summary: Blinking Object By Big Dipper Never seen Before
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around November 17th 2010
